messages.content: Building a brighter future for West Oxfordshire

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Charlotte Hoagland will fight for the wishes of most West Oxfordshire residents and stop Brexit.
Leading the way on tackling the climate crisis with action to protect local services.
Liberal Democrats are campaigning for our rural services such as our schools, hospitals and transport.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for the Lib Dems can stop the Conservatives here in Witney constituency. The General Election here is a clear choice between the Lib Dems and the Tories. That's why Labour supporters are lending their vote to the Lib Dems this time.

issues.brexitEurope: Charlotte Hoagland will fight for the wishes of most West Oxfordshire residents and stop Brexit.
issues.environment: Leading the way on tackling the climate crisis with action to protect local services.

community.content: Leading the way on tackling the climate crisis with action to protect local services.
Liberal Democrats are campaigning for our rural services such as our schools, hospitals and transport.

politicalExperience.role: Leading Lib Dems in Witney constituency
politicalExperience.achievements: Lib Dems topped the poll here in May's European elections, and have led the way campaigning for a fair deal for local rural services. Charlotte and Liz have campaigned for better infrastructure to ease congestion on the A40 locally and to reconnect Witney with the national rail network.

endorsements.endorsement: Councillor Liz Leffman is backing Charlotte Hoagland to win here in Witney constituency.

quotes.text: 'The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything.'

examples: Gained over 700 new councillors in May's local elections.
Membership has surged to a record high of over 125,000 members.
Won parliamentary by-elections in Brecon and Shetland.
Charlotte Hoagland is leading the strongest ever Liberal Democrat campaign in our area to beat the Conservatives.
The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything.
Leading the way on tackling the climate crisis with action to protect local services.
Leading the way on tackling the climate crisis with action to protect local services.
Liberal Democrats are campaigning for our rural services such as our schools, hospitals and transport.
Lib Dems topped the poll here in May's European elections, and have led the way campaigning for a fair deal for local rural services.

Only a vote for the Lib Dems can stop the Conservatives here in Witney constituency. The General Election here is a clear choice between the Lib Dems and the Tories. That's why Labour supporters are lending their vote to the Lib Dems this time.

personalStories.story: Witney resident Charlotte Hoagland is leading the strongest ever Liberal Democrat campaign in our area to beat the Conservatives.

examples: Councillor Liz Leffman is backing Charlotte Hoagland to win here in Witney constituency.
